content.content: There are two options for enabling the real-time service trackers and providing a more modern and transparent customer experience. The Hosted Experience is super simple to integrate and requires zero-effort for the integration system. We also provide a more elaborate widgets experience which is simple to integrate too.

content.title: Widgets
content.content: Arrivy UI Widgets let you embed parts of Arrivy UI in your own pages & views. The example below is the live track customer experience we have seen before and you can choose how and where you would like to render the map or the status journal. This is an experimental feature that is going through rapid development.

content.content: In case you already have an app for your field teams, Arrivy provides task, task status and location related APIs to integrate progress and location reporting. Please reach out to support@arrivy.com in case you need help with integrating these APIs.
